DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmsm_vehicle x left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x0 on x.nature=x0.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x1 on x.vehicletype=x1.typecode left join tms.xtmsm_driver x2 on x.driver=x2.driverid left join tms.xtmsm_driver x3 on x.lorrydriver=x3.driverid left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x4 on x.fueltype=x4.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_status_option x5 on x.usestatus=x5.statuscode
DbDetails.Queryformat: select %{data} from (select x.xtmsm_vehicle_id from %{dbtable} where x.carrierid='%{orgguid}' %{where} GROUP BY x.xtmsm_vehicle_id ORDER BY x.xtmsm_vehicle_id) t
